content.oneLine: A SaaS + IoT platform that gives garment factories real-time visibility of bundles, uniforms, and inventory using UHF RFID—from floor to warehouse to laundry.
content.short: StitchOS is a secure, modular RFID platform for textile production. Track WIP, reduce loss, speed onboarding, and make better decisions with live dashboards and alerts.
content.about: StitchOS connects the factory floor with an RFID-first data backbone. We ingest reads from fixed portals and handhelds, apply rules, and expose clean events, KPIs, and audit trails to teams. The result: reliable throughput, lower shrinkage, and confident planning.
content.mission: Make textile operations visible, predictable, and fair—through simple, secure, real-time software.
content.vision: A connected loom for every factory: live data, zero guesswork.
